metadata.title: CVE-2018-16870 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
It was found that wolfssl before 3.15.7 is vulnerable to a new variant of the Bleichenbacher attack to perform downgrade attacks against TLS. This may lead to leakage of sensible data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-16870` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 4.1.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
